title: How can I get a progress update for my device replacement?
content:
In mid-December I sent my phone away to get fixed under a warranty claim, and was wondering how I can get an update on the progress of this claim?

I received confirmation from the freight company that the phone had been delivered on the 2nd of January, but am yet to receive any communications from Google regarding the matter. Should I expect any communication from Google, or will my device just randomly show up one day?

Thanks in advance,
Joe
